doctor.name: Dr. Biplob Kumar Das
doctor.specialty: Skin, Allergy, Leprosy & Sex Diseases Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Biplob Kumar Das is a Skin Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, DDV. He is a Associate Professor, Dermatology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at BellView Hospital & Medical Services, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Biplob Kumar Das at BellView Hospital & Medical Services, Barisal is 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Kamruzzaman
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Kamruzzaman is an experienced skin, allergy, and sexual diseases specialist in Barisal. He holds MBBS, DDV, and MCPS qualifications and is currently serving as an Assistant Professor in the Department of Skin & VD at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Md. Kamruzzaman specializes in the treatment of various dermatological issues including skin allergies, infections, acne, eczema, psoriasis, vitiligo, hair loss, nail disorders, and sexually transmitted diseases. He provides patient care at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal (955 & 109, Shahid Nazrul Islam Road, Alekanda, Banglabazar, Barisal) with visiting hours from 7pm to 10pm, closed on Fridays.
